Class toktik

java.lang.Object
toktik
public class toktik extends Object
The toktik class imitates a social media platform where users can create accounts and add posts to those accounts , users can follow one another and like each others post.

      public toktik()
      The toktik default constructor is only used in the main class. It creates the graphical user interface.

    • isValidVideo

      public static boolean isValidVideo(String name)
      Used to determine if the a String end with .mpg and is atleast 5 characters long.
      Parameters:
      name - pass in the word that needs to be checked.
      Returns:
      boolean value based on the structure of the name parameter passed in.

    • isValidAccName

      public static boolean isValidAccName(String name)
      Used to check if an account name contains any space cgaracters
      Parameters:
      name - pass in the name you wish to validate
      Returns:
      returns a true booloen if the name does not contain any space characters else it returns false

    • needAtLeastOneAcc

      public static boolean needAtLeastOneAcc(String label)
      Used to decide if a particular button option needs at laeast one account
      Parameters:
      label - pass in the label of the button
      Returns:
      returns true if the button needs at least one account already created else it returns false.

    • needsAccName

      public static boolean needsAccName(String label)
      Used to decide if a particular button option needs to ask the user for an account name
      Parameters:
      label - pass in the button label
      Returns:
      boolean value , true if the button needs an account name and false if it does not
